article.text:
Web Developer

Gary has years of experience coding production websites. He is familiar with all aspects of web application development including relational databases, server administration, speed optimization, templating, design, security, source control, and automated testing.

He has worked on web properties for many different clients including Nickelodeon, General Mills, and Spotify.

Gary enjoys living in his riverside home in New Jersey with his lovely wife and new baby girl. He also enjoys hiking, meditation, jazz, and watching documentaries.
